main event: A high school student observed an oval object in Grand Rapids, Michigan, on October 22, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a half dollar held at arm's length., The edge of the object was indistinct and appeared larger than it actually was., The observer was taking night photos at the time and snapped 5-6 photos., The sighting lasted for 13 minutes., The report concluded the object could be a balloon or an unidentified aircraft.
